value.title: UCLA Abandons Plans to Use Facial Recognition After Backlash

value.title: Your future face-scanning phone could check for live skin

value.title: This smartphone sensor can detect live skin to halt facial login spoofing
value.excerpt: Apple’s Face ID is the gold standard in facial recognition tech, but it’s not one hundred percent foolproof. Highly detailed 3D printed masks can trick it. value.title: Met Police rolls out live facial recognition in London
value.excerpt: This is the Met Police’s first live deployment of facial recognition technology in London, following 10 trials around the city since 2016 and months of public debate about the use of the controversial biometric software on the public. The rollout comes in the wake of similar deployments in countries including China, Brazil, India and Wales.
